title: Understanding Federal and State Taxes
description: An exploration of how federal and state taxes impact income and budgeting, including different types of taxes, tax brackets, and tax planning strategies.
learning_objectives: Distinguish between federal and state taxes
Explain how tax brackets work in a progressive tax system
Identify payroll taxes and their purpose
Compare tax structures across different states

skill_builder.title: Tax System Analysis Activity
skill_builder.description: An interactive activity where students analyze different tax systems and their impact on various income levels
